Success: { "response": { "status": "success", "result": { "ownerName": "LIN MA", "ownerDetails": [ { "ownerName": "LIN MA", "ownerAddress": "56 MAXWELL ST SOUTH TURRAMURRA NSW 2074" }, { "ownerName": "XI ZHAO", "ownerAddress": "56 MAXWELL ST SOUTH TURRAMURRA NSW 2074" } ] } } }
